title: Entropy Engineering Enabled Atomically Dispersed Cu Doping Leading to Exceptionally High Thermoelectric Figure of Merit in n-type Lead Chalcogenides
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00691G, Paper
Ziling Yuan, Mengyue Wu, Shuai Han, Peng-Fei Liu, Zhen-Hua Ge, Bangzhi Ge, Menghua Zhu, Yadong Xu, Wanqi Jie, Dongyao Zhao, Bingchao Yang, Yongsheng Zhang, Ming Liu, Min Zhu, Chao Li, Yuan Yu, Chongjian Zhou
High-entropy lead chalcogenides usually exhibit high ZT values at a very narrow temperature window because the highly disordered lattice structure trades electrical conductivity for low lattice thermal conductivity (Îºlat). Here,...
